original_text:
Then our mouth was filled with laughter,
    and our tongue with shouts of joy;
then they said among the nations,
    “The Lord has done great things for them.”
korean_text: 그 때에 우리 입에는 웃음이 가득하고 우리 혀에는 찬양이 찼었도다 그 때에 뭇 나라 가운데에서 말하기를 여호와께서 그들을 위하여 큰 일을 행하셨다 하였도다

sentences.original_text: Then our mouth was filled with laughter
and our tongue with shouts of joy
then they said among the nations
The Lord has done great things for them
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와께서 그들을 위하여 큰 일을 행하셨다
